#summary API Project
#labels API

= Project =

|| Protocol || HTTP ||
|| Control || OAuth ||
|| Data || JSON ||
|| Access || Group Admin ||

== Create ==

 Create a Project with
{{{
 GET /projects/data.json?name=Example&Count=10
}}}
 or
{{{
 POST /projects
 --
 name=Example&Count=10
}}}
 for request Mime-Type `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` and response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0aefed",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": [
       "aef001",
       "aef002",
       "aef003",
       "aef004",
       "aef005",
       "aef006",
       "aef007",
       "aef008",
       "aef009",
       "aef00a"
     ]
   }
 ]
}}}

== List members ==

{{{
 GET /projects/0fac9/data.json
}}}
 for response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0fac9",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": [
       "ofc001",
       "ofc002",
       "ofc003",
       "ofc004",
       "ofc005",
       "ofc006",
       "ofc007",
       "ofc008",
       "ofc009",
       "ofc00a"
     ]
   }
 ]
}}}

     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": {

 ]
